Nov. 21, 1999 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Championship Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Championship Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-contest-championship-section
Entertainments Contest
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - Ian Williams (cornet) Cory. Best trombone - Chris Thomas - (Tredegar) Prizes - 1st £150, 2nd £90, 3rd £60. 7 bands competed
Feb. 27, 2011, 12:05 a.m. July 2, 2020, 1:35 p.m.
1 Cory Band Jeremy Wise
2 Tredegar Town Band Steve Bastable
3 Burry Port Town Michael Thorne
4 Tongwynlais Temperance Band Adrian Morton
5 Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Band Alan Gibbs
6 Parc and Dare Band Unknown
7 Cwmaman Institute Silver (Tower Colliery) Band Andrew Jones
